channel.title: Full data feed
channel.description: This is the main feed for your online product data for Google Shopping and should be submitted at least every 30 days.

item.title: FootFitter Premium Professional 2-Way Deluxe Shoe Stretcher
item.description:
For the most well-built and reliable two-way stretcher, look no further than the FootFitter Premium Professional 2-Way Deluxe Shoe Stretcher. This shoe stretcher features sturdy stainless steel hardware and polished beech wood heel and toe blocks for unmatched quality and reliability when making adjustments to your favorite pair of shoes. Each stretcher also features several plug holes in the toe block where you can insert the included corn and bunion plugs for spot stretching.

The FootFitter Premium Professional 2-Way Deluxe Shoe Stretcher will work on flat-sole footwear including sneakers, bucks, and flats. There's the FootFitter Premium Professional 2-Way Deluxe Shoe Stretcher, and there's everything else; get the best shoe stretcher, and throw out the rest.

This shoe stretcher is covered by our 2-Year Manufacturer Warranty
item.g:product_type: Shoe and Boot Stretchers > Shoe Stretchers

item.title: FootFitter Premium Professional Boot Stretcher
item.description:
If you're sick of using cheap, unreliable boot stretchers, the FootFitter Premium Professional Boot Stretcher is the finest and highest quality boot stretcher you'll ever see. Arguably the best boot stretcher on the market, this boot expander will stretch the toe area and transform your boots and high-ankle shoes. Prevent pain and blisters when breaking in your footwear.

Just like our infamous premium shoe stretcher, this boot stretcher is made out of highly polished German beech wood and the mechanical parts are constructed in stainless steel. With this easy-to-use stretcher, you'll never have to purchase another boot stretcher again. The stretcher comes with 3 bunion plugs that will fit into the 14 to 16 holes located in the toe area. Horizontally stretches the width of a boot or high top shoe for a better fit.
item.g:product_type: Shoe and Boot Stretchers > Boot Stretchers

item.title: FootFitter Premium Professional One-Way Single Shoe Stretcher
item.description: The FootFitter Premium Professional One-Way Shoe Stretcher will transform any tight pair of shoes into perfectly fitting, comfortable shoes. This high quality shoe stretcher allows you to stretch your shoes in restrictive spots with a complimentary set of bunion plugs. These will allow you to widen your shoes in all the pressure point areas. This durable shoe stretcher also comes with a 2 year Manufacturer's Warranty.
item.g:product_type: Shoe and Boot Stretchers > Shoe Stretchers

item.title: Boot Hanger with Clip
item.description:
The boot hanger is the easy way to store your boots! It simply clamps onto the upper shaft of your boots and can easily be hung in any closet or over the door hanger! This convenient device will also work with boots, mittens, towels and bathmats.

Note: Not sold as a pair

item.title: Toe Box Lifter for Shoes and Boots
item.description: The Toe Box Lifter for Shoes and Boots lets you stretch the hard to reach toe area of your shoes and boots. With this specially designed toe box lifter, you'll get pain relief in all the right places. Works great against hammertoes and other toe-related problems.
item.g:product_type: Shoe and Boot Stretchers > Boot Stretchers
Shoe and Boot Stretchers > Shoe Stretchers

item.title: FootFitter Ball & Ring Cast Iron Bunion Stretcher
item.description: The FootFitter Ball and Ring Cast Iron Bunion Stretcher is the ideal solution for anyone that needs to stretch that one certain spot in your shoe. Helps those affected with corns, hammertoes, bunions, and other foot-related pressure points. For the best results, we recommend clamping on the shoe stretcher and leaving it overnight. Made of heavy duty steel. One size fits all.
item.g:product_type: Shoe and Boot Stretchers > Boot Stretchers
Shoe and Boot Stretchers > Shoe Stretchers

item.title: Cast Aluminum Combination Boot Instep and Shaft Stretcher
item.description: The Cast Aluminum Combination Boot Instep and Shaft Stretcher is a professional device used to stretch the instep and shaft of your boots. It gradually stretches the boot shaft and instep to relieve tightness around the calf muscles. It has a solid metal contraption to allow from switching between stretching the instep and the shaft. For instructions, please view the directions below. This heavy duty stretcher will last you through the years and will fit most boots.
item.g:product_type: Shoe and Boot Stretchers > Boot Stretchers

item.title: Cast Aluminum Boot Instep Stretcher and Vamp Raiser
item.description:
The Cast Aluminum Boot Instep Stretcher and Vamp Raiser is a high performance professional device that stretches the instep of your boots. If you have a tight fitted area near the vamp area of your boot, this cast boot stretcher is perfect for you. Provide yourself with more room in the most difficult-to-stretch part of your boot.

The Cast Aluminum Boot Instep Stretcher and Vamp Raiser is equipped with a screw mechanism that allows you to apply just the right amount of pressure to stretch your boots.
item.g:product_type: Shoe and Boot Stretchers > Boot Stretchers

item.title: Cast Aluminum Toe Stretcher for Boots
item.description: The Cast Aluminum Toe Stretcher is ideal for stretching the toe box of your boots. The patented construction allows the long handle to work the stretching mechanism from the top of the boot shaft without bending or wrinkling your boot. The cast aluminum construction of the Toe Stretcher guarantees durable and high-quality stretching results overnight. With the Boot Toe Stretcher, tight pinching boots will not be problem ever again.
item.g:product_type: Shoe and Boot Stretchers > Boot Stretchers

item.title: FootFitter Premium Professional Western Cowboy Boot Stretcher
item.description:
The FootFitter Premium Professional Western Cowboy Boot Stretcher is designed specifically to fit in Western-style boots. Unlike hiking and casual boots, Western-style boots have an angled midsole between the heel and toe areas of the boot. This cowboy boot stretcher is constructed with an angle to get deep into your bootﾒs toe box for a proper and thorough stretch.

The FootFitter Premium Professional Western Cowboy Boot Stretcher features a hinged joint that allows you to fit the stretcher into the toe box without damaging your bootﾒs shaft or collar. Its polished beech wood construction ensures resilience through many boot stretches on the horizon.

Only works for Western-style boots. Does not work for safety boots, steel toe boots and most modern boots.

Men's* Women's*
Small 4 - 6.5 5 - 8
Medium 6 - 8 7.5 - 9.5
Large 9 - 11 9.5 - 12
X-Large 12 - 15

*The sizing on this chart is approximated. Due to the variations in shoe sizing per brand, the boot stretcher may or may not fit your boot with the corresponding size.
item.g:product_type: Shoe and Boot Stretchers > Boot Stretchers

item.title: FootFitter Deluxe Solid Plastic Boot Trees
item.description: Give your boots the ultimate spur to stay in shape with our new Deluxe Solid Plastic Boot Shaper! Constructed of solid durable plastic, these new deluxe boot shapers will keep your boots looking their best for years to come! Lightweight and economical, these Deluxe Solid Plastic Boot Shapers are perfect for storing or displaying all types of boots. For your convenience, we offer the Deluxe Solid Plastic Boot Trees in two lengths : 10.5"ﾝ and 14". Buy a pair today, and start your boots on the road to longevity!

item.title: FootFitter Boot Hanger
item.description: The FootFitter Boot Hanger is an easy-to-use boot hanger and shaft support in one. This innovative tool allows for extra storage space. It measures 21 inches in length, but is adjustable to fit shorter boot lengths.

item.title: FootFitter Sensomatic Plastic Boot Shaper
item.description: The FootFitter Sensomatic Plastic Boot shapers are patented with Sensomatic technology that was developed in Germany. This unique and proven design will gently hold your boots in shape. It has two-sided plastic pieces that are attached by a center bracket that uses the sensomatic mechanism which guarantees that your boots are kept in shape with the right amount of tension. These boot trees automatically adjust to a preset tension that keeps your boots in shape and does not break the leather or make them too loose. The center piece also has a convenient handle that can be used as a boot hanger. Comes in 3 different lengths.

item.title: FootFitter Premium 3"- 6" High Heel Shoe Stretcher
item.description:
The FootFitter Premium 3"- 6" High Heel Shoe Stretcher is built to widen the toe area for 3"-6" high heels. Tight-fitted high heels are a thing of the past once you use this stretcher, which is heralded as the best high heel stretcher on the market. Still look great and feel comfortable after stretching your heels overnight.

This stretcher is built and perfectly shaped to fit into heels over 3 inches. One of the top quality stretchers on FootFitter, the wooden components are made up of high quality polished beech wood and stainless steel mechanisms. For extra pressure point relief, the stretcher includes 3 bunion plugs that will fit into any of the 12 holes provided.

Size Actual Width Max Width
Women's Small 2.5" 3.5"
Women's Medium 2.75" 4"
Women's Large 3" 4"
item.g:product_type: Shoe and Boot Stretchers > Shoe Stretchers

item.title: FootFitter Metal Spot Stretching Plug for Shoe Stretchers
item.description:
This stretcher insert is made from strong metal and will help with pressure points while stretching your shoes. It simply inserts into the built in holes on most shoe stretchers.

This item only fits for the following items
- Professional One-Way Shoe Stretcher
- FootFitter High Heel Shoe Stretcher
- Professional Western Boot Stretcher

Contents: One piece.
item.g:product_type: Shoe and Boot Stretchers > Stretcher Accessories

item.title: Professional Shoe Toe Raiser
item.description:
This Professional Toe Raiser is a specially designed tool for stretching the toe box of your shoes. It is built of solid hard wood and built with all metal stretching mechanisms. If you're looking for a little extra space in the toe area, this is the tool for you! Put an end to pinching shoes and hammer toes.

Shoe stretchers are not suited for wide or narrow width shoe sizes like B, C, W, E, EE, or EEE.
item.g:product_type: Shoe and Boot Stretchers > Shoe Stretchers

item.title: Shoe Instep Stretcher and Vamp Raiser
item.description:
The Shoe Instep Stretcher or Vamp Raiser is specially designed to stretch the instep or the vamp area of your shoes. This professional stretcher has a hardwood foot piece that will fit deep into your shoes and raise the instep. It has all metal stretching mechanisms and is built to last.

Note:This is stretcher is shipped with the pivot screw fully tightened. This screw needs to be adjusted before using the stretcher.
item.g:product_type: Shoe and Boot Stretchers > Shoe Stretchers

item.title: FootFitter 1"- 3" High Heel Shoe Stretcher
item.description:
This specially designed FootFitter 1"- 3" High Heel Shoe Stretcher is built to stretch the toe area for heels between 1"-3" heels. Provide your toes with extra relief from foot ailments like corns, calluses, and bunions. This stretcher is made of premium rubber wood and shaped to fit perfectly into pumps and any other kind of high heel shoes. Helps relieve the pain caused by long hours in uncomfortable high heels.

item.title: FootFitter Professional 2-Way Single Shoe Stretcher
item.description:
When feet are uncomfortable or shoes don't fit, the whole body is negatively affected. The FootFitter Professional 2-Way Shoe Stretcher is the perfect tool to get those shoes fitting properly. Made from solid rubber wood and a stretching mechanism that is reinforced with a steel-threaded rod, this stretcher is durable for almost any shoe.

Note: This shoe stretcher does not work in boots or high heel shoes. We recommend purchasing the size that corresponds with your current shoe size. Shoe stretchers are not suited for narrow-width or wide-width shoe sizes.

item.title: FootFitter Plastic Spot Stretching Plug Set

FootFitter Premium Professional 2-Way Deluxe FootFitter Professional 2-Way Stretcher FootFitter Premium Professional One Way Shoe Stretcher FootFitter Premium Professional Boot Stretcher FootFitter Premium 3"-6" High Heel Shoe Stretcher Aluminum Shoe Stretcher

item.title: FootFitter Travel Shoe Care Bag
item.description:
Being on the road is no excuse for dull and scuffed shoes. To make transporting your shoe care kit a bit easier, you'll want to grab the FootFitter Travel Shoe Care Bag. This compact travel bag features a resilient nylon construction with an easy-open, heavy-duty zipper closure. The interior space boasts a surprisingly ample amount of space for a shoe shine brush, two daubers, two shoe polish jars, and a shoe shine cloth.

The FootFitter Travel Shoe Care Bag is equipped with a loop handle for easy transport and slim profile that takes minimal space in your suitcase and even your carry-on. Great for traveling professionals, this shoe accessory bag is the best way to take your shoe care accessories with you on the road to keep your shoes looking sharp.

item.description:
Saphir's reputation precedes itself, thanks to their complete range of intricately crafted leather care goods. Saphir Medaille D'Or Pommadier Cream Shoe Polish is a known favorite in that range of products and offers just what you expect from the premium French company. This shoe cream polish is made up of a myriad of natural ingredients—turpentine, beeswax, carnauba wax, lanolin, mink oil, neatsfoot oil, and vegetal wax—that nourishes leather and restores its natural patina with a soft shine.

The oleophobic qualities of the natural ingredients creates a protective, waterproof coating that will keep your favorite pair of shoes looking sharper for longer. Saphir Medaille D'Or Pommadier Cream Shoe Polish features a creamy consistency that is best applied with a polish applicator brush.

item.title: Saphir Extra-Fine Cream Surfine Shoe Polish
item.description:
Shoe aficionados know to reach for Saphir Extra-Fine Cream Surfine Shoe Polish for the most brilliant shine. This creamy shoe polish cream is made of natural ingredients including beeswax and almond oil. This allows for easy and thorough application which sets the stage for an even, high-gloss shine. Saphir Extra-Fine Cream Surfine Shoe Polish doubly functions as a leather conditioner that penetrates the material to restore its suppleness.

This cream shoe polish is a standout due to its high pigment concentration that gives your shoes a bold and vibrant color while also bringing out the natural patina of the leather.

item.title: Tarrago Shoe Cream Polish
item.description:
Restore vibrance and shine to your favorite pair of leather shoes with Tarrago Shoe Cream Polish. This soft, wax-based shoe cream has a creamy consistency that is easy to apply and allows for optimum coverage to effectively cover scuffs and fill deeper scratches. Ingredients like carnauba wax and beeswax work to condition the leather, which restores its flexibility and promotes resilience through further wear. Such ingredients also work as a waterproof coating that further protects your shoes from the elements.

Tarrago Shoe Cream dries very quickly and is suitable for routine maintenance of your favorite pair of shoes. Use on your favorite pair of natural, smooth leather or synthetic leather shoes, and enjoy your shoes like they're new again.

item.title: FootFitter Shoe Stretch Spray
item.description: FootFitter Shoe Stretch Spray is specially designed to penetrate shoe leather quickly and relax the fibers for easy stretching. We recommend spraying the inside or outside of your shoe with the shoe stretch spray and using a FootFitter Shoe Stretcher to bring your shoe to its desired size.
item.g:product_type: Shoe and Boot Stretchers > Stretcher Accessories

item.title: Beck Replacement Buffer for Beck Diplomat Electric Shoe Polisher
item.description:
The Beck Diplomat Electric Shoe Polisher is a godsend for those that love (or even need) to always keep their leather shoes in sparkling shape. Naturally, you'll want to keep using this wonderful shoe shine tool, so grab a couple of these Beck Replacement Buffers. Made of 100% lamb's wool hides, these authentic Beck Diplomat shoe shine brushes are essential to the stunning shine delivered by Beck Diplomat Electric Shoe Polisher.

These buffer pads are available in four colors that are purely aesthetic; these colors do not designate a specific function. If you are interested in an electric shoe polisher, please visit the following link: Beck Diplomat Electric Shoe Polisher.

item.title: Ray Charles Easy Shine Electric Shoe Polisher
item.description:
The Ray Charles Easy Shine Electric Shoe Polisher Kit is quick, mess-free way to give your shoes an impressive shine. With its compact and lightweight design, this handheld shoe polisher is the perfect travel tool to maintain your shoes' appearance while on the go. The ergonomic design contours to the shape of your hand for easy handling and comfort.

The Ray Charles Easy Shine Electric Shoe Polisher Kit features a rechargeable battery that can be charged via USB port. Give your shoes the perfect shine no matter where you are. Let's take a closer look at what's included:

Ray Charles Easy Shine Electric Shoe Polisher
Features a strong motorized mechanism to rotate the attachments. Lasts for approximately 40 minutes on a full charge.

Brush attachment
Removes dirt and debris from leather material and seams

Sponge attachment
Gently applies your favorite shoe polish with ease.

Buffer pad attachment
Used for finishing up your shoe polishing regiment for a spectacular finish.

item.title: Beck Diplomat Electric Shoe Polisher
item.description:
The Beck Diplomat Electric Shoe Polisher is a legendary tool that has been putting smiles on shoe enthusiasts for decades. This floor-standing electric show polisher is outfitted with a heavy-duty, commercial-grade motor to rapidly rotate the buffers. This motor is housed in a sturdy die-cast, zinc alloy body that is poised to last for many years.

This well-built electric shoe polisher comes ready-to-use and has a convenient push-button control on the handle for convenience and comfort during operation. Beck Shoe Polishers are recognized worldwide as the finest personal polishers available, and they out-perform other brands in terms of excellent shine and years of service. Find out what the fuss is about and take one home!

Specifications: 120 volts, 1.6 amps, 60Hz, 37.3 watts

item.description:

This shoe valet features a hinged lid that is outfitted with a sturdy lid latch that securely stays closed.

item.description:
These metal boot hooks take the effort out of pulling on your western or riding boots. Simply insert the boot hooks into the loops of your boots and you will slip into your boots with ease. They have a light wood handle that is ergonomically designed. Sold in pairs.

item.title: FootFitter Genuine Horsehair Shoe Polish Pencil Dauber
item.description:
An essential tool like a shoe polish applicator brush simply has to work and work well. We've taken this principle in crafting our FootFitter Genuine Horsehair Shoe Polish Pencil Dauber. This polish applicator brush is made with 100% genuine horsehair bristles that is firm enough to get into the nooks and crannies of your shoe yet soft enough that they won't damage the shoe surface. Each supple bristle is tightly stitched into the polished wooden handle, which is contoured to sit comfortably in your fingers.

The FootFitter Genuine Horsehair Shoe Polish Pencil Dauber is our most compact shoe polish applicator and is a great addition to your travel shoe care kit. The pencil-style design also makes dipping into smaller polish jars a lot easier.

item.title: FootFitter Professional 4-Way Suede and Nubuck Cleaner
item.description:
Wearers (and especially lovers) of suede and nubuck shoes shouldn't be without the FootFitter Professional 4-Way Suede and Nubuck Cleaner. This nifty tool features four different cleaning tools to make short work of any type of stains or scuff on your favorite pair of shoes. Each of these tools is set in a triangular handle that grants a sure grip even when working vigorously on more stubborn stains. FootFitter Professional 4-Way Suede and Nubuck Cleaner features a compact body that can be kept in your suitcase or glove compartment for on-the-fly touch-ups. Here is what we recommend each tool be used for:
  1. Nylon bristles: Removing light dirt, dust, and debris
  2. Brass bristles: Removing stubborn dirt and debris
  3. Stain eraser: Rubbing away scuffs and stubborn stains on finer, more delicate suede or nubuck
  4. Rubber crepe tool: Rids material of large deposits of dirt or debris and evenly restores nap

item.title: FootFitter Large Crepe Brush for Suede and Nubuck
item.description:
It's not unusual to fall in love with your suede shoes; however, you may not love them so much when they get a bit dirty. The FootFitter Large Crepe Brush for Suede and Nubuck can remedy that. This rubber cleaning tool is an essential suede and nubuck shoe care instrument as it is suitable for all types of suede and nubuck material including those that are very delicate. The soft and sticky rubber crepe material works so effectively because it gets deep within the nap of the suede/nubuck material and grabs trapped dirt and debris. To remove more stubborn stains and filth, just apply more pressure to snag these unwanted contaminants.

The FootFitter Large Crepe Brush for Suede and Nubuck is most effective when used on flat area of your shoes. If your shoe features Brogueing or other hard-to-reach seams and perforations, we recommend using the FootFitter Suede/Nubuck Nylon Shoe Cleaning Brush to dislodge trapped dirt and debris.

item.title: FootFitter Suede/Nubuck Nylon Shoe Cleaning Brush
item.description:
Anyone that has owned a pair of suede or nubuck shoes knows that when they get dirty, it really tends to show. If and when your shoes get to that point, we recommend you grab the FootFitter Suede/Nubuck Nylon Shoe Cleaning Brush. This all-purpose shoe care tool will be your go-to cleaning implement of choice when it comes to shoes with suede or nubuck material. The stiff nylon bristles effectively penetrate the nap of suede and nubuck to loosen and remove trapped dirt, dust, and debris. Each tuft of nylon bristles is sewn into a molded beech wood handle that feels secure in your hand.

In addition to its suede and nubuck cleaning abilities, the FootFitter Suede/Nubuck Nylon Shoe Cleaning Brush can be used to dislodge dust and debris from the seams and perforations of your sneakers or smooth leather shoes. What's more, the waterproof quality of the nylon bristles makes washing this tool easy before your next cleaning touchup.

item.title: FootFitter Suede/Nubuck Brass Shoe Cleaning Brush
item.description:
Suede and nubuck shoes have a unique and unmatched aesthetic appeal to them. Yet when they are soiled and dirty, their appearance is quite the opposite, resembling a filthy terry towel. Luckily you have the FootFitter Suede/Nubuck Brass Shoe Cleaning Brush at your disposal. This simple shoe cleaning brush is equipped with brass bristles that effectively lifts dirt and debris trapped in the nap of suede and nubuck materials. What's more, the dense brass bristles lift the nap of suede and nubuck material, restoring your shoes to their former glory.

The FootFitter Suede/Nubuck Brass Shoe Cleaning Brush is compact in size and is suited for on-the-fly touchups when traveling. Keep your suede and nubuck shoes looking their best with this handy brass shoe cleaning brush.

item.title: FootFitter Shoe Cleaning Brush with Coco Bristles
item.description:
Removing stubborn, caked-on dirt or mud from the soles of your favorite pair of shoes is an easy task with the FootFitter Shoe Cleaning Brush with Coco Bristles. This heavy-duty shoe cleaning brush is outfitted with natural coco bristles due to their stiff backbone and unmatched scraping abilities. Due to the stiffness of these bristles, it is best to use this with shoes or boots that have rugged upper material as more delicate leathers may get scratched. Each tuft of coco bristles is sewn into a durable German beech wood handle for long-lasting durability. A pointed tip on one side of the brush allows you to get deep into those difficult-to-reach areas.

The FootFitter Shoe Cleaning Brush with Coco Bristles can be abrasive to more delicate leather materials so be sure to test an inconspicuous area of your shoe before a full cleaning and a thorough polishing.

item.title: FootFitter Signature Shoe Shine Dauber (Large)
item.description:
You can apply shoe polish with a cotton cloth, but you just won't achieve the same outstanding finish as you would if you used the FootFitter Signature Shoe Shine Dauber. This luxurious shoe polish applicator brush is made of 100% genuine horsehair bristles that easily reach the seams and perforations that a cotton cloth is just unable to reach. Shoes that feature Brogueing or are highly-structured especially require the ability that only a quality shoe shine dauber can provide.

The FootFitter Signature Shoe Shine Dauber features a durable German beech wood handle with a clear coat finish for long-lasting resilience. A long, contoured body promotes a comfortable grip that keeps your favorite polish, cream, or wax from getting on your fingers. Do the job right, and do the job well with the FootFitter Signature Shoe Shine Dauber.

item.title: FootFitter Genuine Horsehair Shoe Shine Brush
item.description:
Your favorite shoes deserve nothing less than the best, so give it the luxury of the FootFitter Genuine Horsehair Shoe Shine Brush. This soft shoe polishing brush is crafted with genuine horsehair bristles that are gentle on even the most delicate footwear. While soft and flexible, the natural bristles are still firm enough to remove the hard-to-reach dust that may get trapped in your shoes seams. Holding it all together is a lacquered wooden handle that features finger grooves on the sides of the brush for comfort in hand.

The FootFitter Genuine Horsehair Shoe Shine Brush is available in Black or Grey-Brown to suit your shoe polish, wax, or cream of choice. Get that head-turning shine on your shoes with this luxurious shoe care brush.

item.title: FootFitter Signature Regular Shoe Shine Brush
item.description:
The humble shoe shine brush is an absolutely essential tool in any shoe polishing kit and polishing routine. Given that fact, go with the best. Go with the FootFitter Signature Regular Shoe Shine Brush. This German-made shoe shine brush features a sturdy wooden handle that is varnished to increase its resilience. Finger grooves on the curved handle ensure a sure grip when ridding your shoes from dirt or debris. Sewn into the handle are 100% premium horsehair bristles that effectively reach the hard-to-reach areas like between seams to remove dust and evenly spread shoe polish, wax, or cream.

This shoe cleaning brush is densely packed and tightly stitched with your choice of horsehair bristle color: Black or Grey-Brown. With its premium materials and construction, the FootFitter Signature Regular Shoe Shine Brush is the quintessential shoe shine brush that will deliver nothing less than the finest shoe care for a lifetime.

If you would like both brushes in a set for a better value, please visit the following link: FootFitter Signature Regular Shoe Shine Brush Set.

item.description:

This shoe shine brush is crafted with 100% genuine horsehair bristles for their unrivaled softness that is gentle on your precious pair of leather shoes. Each bristle is sewn into the polished wooden handle, which is ergonomically tapered with finger grooves for optimal grip.

FootFitter Signature Jumbo Shoe Shine Brush is available in two bristle colors to match your preferred shoe polish color: Black and Grey-Brown. For better value, this brush can also be purchased as part of a two-brush set, which you can find here: FootFitter Signature Jumbo Shoe Shine Brush Set.

item.title: FootFitter Suede and Nubuck Leather 4-Way Shoe Cleaner Brush
item.description:
Compared to their smooth leather counterparts, suede and nubuck shoes are very prone to looking filthy. The reason? The fuzzy nap on the surface of such materials is porous and tends to trap dust, dirt, and debris deep in the material. The solution? You can toss those suede shoes out. An even better solution would be to grab the FootFitter Suede and Nubuck Leather 4-Way Shoe Cleaner Brush. This multifaceted shoe cleaning tool was conceived and developed specifically to make cleaning suede and nubuck shoes much quicker and easier:
  1. Silicone bristles: Removes heavier stains, scuff marks from a shoe's upper nap, welt, and midsole
  2. Nylon-brass combo bristles: Gets rid of lighter stains and dirt buildup; revives nap
  3. Arched half-circle: Reaches into the welt area to remove contaminants
  4. Thin rubber blade: Dislodges foreign particles in deep crevices and grooves

item.title: FootFitter Professional Cotton Shoe Shine Cloth
item.description:
Getting that brilliant, mirror-like finish on your shoes is largely dependent on how well you buff your shoes after applying shoe cream, polish, or wax. The key is to build up heat by vigorously rubbing the surface of your leather shoes. While you can certainly achieve an attractive shine with a shoe shine brush, a tool like the FootFitter Professional Cotton Shoe Shine Cloth will get you that gleaming finish you're seeking. Made of finely-woven cotton, this shoe care accessory is cut with ample length, allowing for maximum leverage when buffing.

Thanks to its fine weave, the FootFitter Professional Cotton Shoe Shine Cloth will not leave lint on the surface of your shoe, which also makes it ideal for quick cleanups and applying polish. Whether you have shell cordovan, calfskin, or even patent leather, grab a couple of these Italian-made premium shoe shine cloths for that dazzling shine.
